Quarto has [great documentation](https://quarto.org/docs/guide/) Here are a few topics that I find useful:

-   Here's a list of [other format options](https://quarto.org/docs/reference/formats/html.html) for HTML reports

-   Here's how to create a [website with quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/) like I did with these materials

    -   And then how to [make it public with GitHub pages](https://quarto.org/docs/publishing/github-pages.html)

-   Here's how to create a [book with quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/books/)

-   Here's how to build a [blog with quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-blog.html)

-   Here's how to make [slideshows with quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/)
